title: HEEEEEELP
body:
So uh ever since this morning ive had this weird bug where my character would randomly speed up like every 2-3 sec, as if my client werent keeping up with the server, i can still cast abilitys and everything normaly. its just that me and everything else on the map, keeps speeding up... making it unplayable pls help :((({{sticker:sg-shisa}}

Update: seems to be something server related as it works fine in practice tool

replies.body: yeah it seems to be working fine again
